title: Bhavana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: Casual vegetarian Indian restaurant. By taxi, get off at Lucky Plaza, which is near Old Lulu shopping mall, and walk back on the main road a few blocks to Hayath building. The name board of the restaurant is not bright enough so you might not notice it at first sight. Located sandwiched between Hayath Centre and Mubarak Centre, on Zayed Ibn Sultan St.
